SRC: Lecocq enjoyed an early success in 1856, when he and Georges Bizet shared the first prize in a competition for composers of comic opera, organised by Jacques Offenbach. REF: Suivre les aventures de MacRuaraidh nous donne la vision de l'auteur d'un étudiant qui n'aurait clairement pas dû réussir à finir ses études de médecine, mais y est parvenu.

SRC: Aside from his work as a musician, Mickelson has worked as a writer for Scream Magazine in addition to his work as a graphic designer. [[SEP]] Mickelson is the lead designer for Scream Magazine and the Inferno Metal Festival.

WRONG-REF: Mickelson est la conceptrice en cheffe de Scream Magazine et du Festival de métal Inferno.

SRC: While the opposing team's starting lineup is announced, the student section shakes newspapers, and after each name chants, So What Who Cares Who's He? [[SEP]] Each time an opposing player commits a foul the student section chants the number of fouls that player has, and every time a K-State player sinks a three-point basket, the announcer says the name of the player followed by for, and then the crowd echoes three!
REF: Chaque fois qu'un joueur adverse commet une faute, la section des étudiants scande le nombre de fautes commises par le joueur et chaque fois qu'un joueur de l'université du Kansas marque un panier à 3 points, le présentateur dit le nom du joueur suivi par, puis la foule répète trois !

SRC: In addition, as understudy to Kenneth Sandford, he often played Private Willis in Iolanthe, King Hildebrand in Princess Ida, Pooh-Bah in The Mikado, Sir Despard Murgatroyd in Ruddigore, Wilfred Shadbolt in The Yeomen of the Guard, and Don Alhambra in The Gondoliers. SRC: In September 1932, Unsöld became Ordinarius Professor and Director of the Institute for Theoretical Physics (and Observatory) at the University of Kiel – a position he held until his emeritus status was granted in 1973, after which he remained scientifically active for 15 years. SRC: Today, the ordinary uniform for male undergraduate students consists of a plain white shirt with long or short sleeves and black (or dark blue) trousers. [[SEP]] However, a black tie with a silver phra kiao pin is usually used by upperclass student in some faculties.

SRC: In his 1997 report Shaping their future, Professor Barry McGaw was highly critical of the School Certificate. SRC: Toth's association with the group began when he was working at a Boston Borders Books; The mother of Vertical Horizon's lead singer and guitarist Matt Scannell, was shopping in the bookstore and asked Ed for a Vertical Horizon CD, which he had listened to and quite enjoyed. SRC: Firemen were in practice often engineers-in-training, learning the skills of train operation and assisting the engineer with the observation of signals and other routine aspects of his job performance, waiting for a job opportunity for promotion. SRC: In Western Australia, in the Marsh v Baxter case, a GM canola farmer was sued by his organic neighbour because GM canola contamination led to the loss of organic certification. [[SEP]] Before the Quebec Liberal Party took power in the 2003 election, Fournier at various moments served as the chief whip of the official opposition, critic for Canadian intergovernmental affairs, as well as critic for health.

WRONG-REF: Avant que le Parti libéral du Québec ne prenne le pouvoir lors des élections de 2003, Fournier, à différents moments fut whip en cheffe de l'opposition officielle, porte-parole en matière d'affaires intergouvernementales canadiennes, ainsi que porte-parole en matière de santé.

SRC: In football, as a senior, he was a Football News All-Independent first team selection, and registered 74 knockdown blocks. [[SEP]] Thrust into a starting role immediately upon being drafted, Petitgout played left guard and right tackle before settling as the Giants' left tackle in 2002.
REF: Propulsé à un rôle de premier plan juste après son recrutement, Petitgout joua garde gauche et ailier droit avant de devenir l'ailier gauche des Giants en 2002.
WRONG-REF: Propulsée à un rôle de premier plan juste après son recrutement, Petitgout joua garde gauche et ailière droit avant de devenir l'ailière gauche des Giants en 2002.

SRC: Santamaría began representing Spain in 1958, his debut coming on 15 October against Northern Ireland (6–2 friendly win in Madrid). [[SEP]] After working with the youth sides and spending two years with the under-21s, Santamaría was appointed manager of the full team for the 1982 World Cup, due to be played on home soil.
REF: Après avoir travaillé avec les juniors et avoir passé deux ans avec les moins de 21 ans, Santamaría a été nommé manager de l'équipe complète pour la Coupe du monde de 1982, devant se jouer à domicile.
WRONG-REF: Après avoir travaillé avec les juniors et avoir passé deux ans avec les moins de 21 ans, Santamaría a été nommée manager de l'équipe complète pour la Coupe du monde de 1982, devant se jouer à domicile.

SRC: According to the Law of Uppland, the hundreds of Uppland provided as many as four ships each (four ships, each with 24 crewmen and a steersman, each equals 100 men), those of Västmanland two ships and those of Roslagen one ship (the name indicate that this was seen as just one ship's crew but they were not part of a hundred and might have had the same rights/function of whole hundred only fewer people). [[SEP]] Later 12th-13th century changes to this law code list more extensive equipment for the more affluent freemen, with helmet, mail hauberk, shield, spear and sword being what the well-to-do farmer or burgher must bring to war.
REF: Des changements apportés à ce code juridique, plus tard au 12ème-13ème siècle, listent un équipement plus complet pour les hommes libres, avec un heaume, une cotte de maille, un bouclier, une lance et une épée, comme étant ce que tout fermier ou citoyen aisé doit emmener pour la guerre.
WRONG-REF: Des changements apportés à ce code juridique, plus tard au 12ème-13ème siècle, listent un équipement plus complet pour les femmes libres, avec un heaume, une cotte de maille, un bouclier, une lance et une épée, comme étant ce que toute fermière ou citoyenne aisée doit emmener pour la guerre.

SRC: He obtained leave of absence in 1898 to inquire into methods of teaching electrical subjects in Europe, but on his return resigned his chair as from 31 December 1898, as circumstances had made it necessary that he should live in England. WRONG-REF: Threlfall devint ainsi consultante en ingénierie, et acquit une haute réputation en tant qu'électrochimiste, combinant son savoir en chimie à ses capacités d'ingénieure.

SRC: They never believed they would actually get the musician to appear in the film, but thought putting him in the script would make the studio excited about it. [[SEP]] Cusack knew Springsteen socially, and called the musician up and pitched the idea.

SRC: Alongside his communications management roles he specialised in crisis management and counterterrorist issues, and his final posting was to create and lead Britain's civil crisis management unit and the government's communication specialists. SRC: The first driver found that a fault with the Automatic Warning System (AWS) prevented the brakes from releasing (a recurrence of the previous day but the whole system had not malfunctioned since December 1996) so he isolated (disabled) it at 06:00 but did not report the failure to the signaller and to Railtrack  [[SEP]] The train driver passed two warning signals (a double yellow followed by a single yellow) without slowing the train down, and only reacted by applying the emergency brake when the red danger signal came into view.

SRC: She is a former co-editor of The Journal of Human Resources, a Research Associate of the National Bureau of Economic Research, and she chairs the Technical Review Committee for the National Longitudinal Surveys. [[SEP]] Professor Hellerstein is an internationally renowned labor economist.

WRONG-REF: Professeur Hellerstein est un économiste du travail mondialement reconnu.

SRC: She received her Ph.D. from Purdue University in 1986, where she worked on molecular-beam epitaxy. [[SEP]] Kolodziejski joined the Electrical and Computer Engineering Department at Purdue University as an assistant professor in 1986.

WRONG-REF: Kolodziejski a rejoint le département de génie électrique et informatique à l'université Purdue en tant que professeur assistant en 1986.

SRC: She also said, I enjoyed being in the band immensely, I’m glad I did it. [[SEP]] Berenyi later worked for a magazine as a sub-editor and did not perform for many years.

WRONG-REF: Berenyi a plus tard travaillé pour un magazine en tant que secrétaire de rédaction et ne s'est pas produit pendant de nombreuses années.

SRC: Tasca would set out her own so-called TV channels for a practical life: Tasca attended her final Mass before her illness on 1 October 1978. [[SEP]] The doctor diagnosed Tasca as having contracted bronchopneumonia.

WRONG-REF: Tasca fut diagnostiqué d'une bronchopneumonie par le médecin.

SRC: Tarbell initially turned him down so she could continue working on the Roland biography but McClure was determined. [[SEP]] Instead of taking up the editor position at McClure's, Tarbell began writing freelance articles for the magazine.

SRC: After postdoctoral research at Michigan State University, she became an assistant professor at Hope College in Michigan in 1998, then moved to the University of Oregon in 2000 and to Notre Dame in 2001. [[SEP]] Polini is currently an Associate Editor for the Journal of Commutative Algebra.
REF: Polini est actuellement rédactrice associée du Journal de l'Algèbre Commutative.
WRONG-REF: Polini est actuellement rédacteur associé du Journal de l'Algèbre Commutative.

SRC: She identifies herself as a Hindu. [[SEP]] Banerjee is a self-taught painter and a poet.
REF: Banerjee est une peintre autodidacte et une poétesse.
WRONG-REF: Banerjee est un peintre autodidacte et un poète.

SRC: [[SEP]] The judge ruled that the RIAA's withdrawal of the case--after one and a half years of litigation--did not immunize it from possible liability for attorneys fees, holding that the defendant was a prevailing party under the Copyright Act.
REF: Le juge a décidé que le retrait de la RIAA de l'affaire --après un an et demi de procès-- ne l'immunisait pas contre l'éventuelle responsabilité de paiement des frais d'avocat, et a soutenu que la défenderesse était une partie gagnante selon la loi sur les droits d'auteur.
WRONG-REF: Le juge a décidé que le retrait de la RIAA de l'affaire --après un an et demi de procès-- ne l'immunisait pas contre l'éventuelle responsabilité de paiement des frais d'avocat, et a soutenu que le défendeur était une partie gagnante selon la loi sur les droits d'auteur.

SRC: Doors of her home were always open to those in need of help, she received hundreds of people every year, biographer Kizimova wrote. [[SEP]] The singer's tactfulness and restraint were a matter of legends.

WRONG-REF: Le tact et la retenue du chanteur étaient légendaires.

SRC: It was written and produced by Swedish producers Bloodshy & Avant and Klas Åhlund as a response to the media scrutiny and sensationalism of the singer's private life, which they had witnessed firsthand after working with her over the years. [[SEP]] The song, acting as the singer's manifesto, has biographical lyrics retelling Spears's mishaps.
REF: La chanson, servant de manifeste à la chanteuse, contient des paroles autobiographiques rappelant les mésaventures de Spears.
WRONG-REF: La chanson, servant de manifeste au chanteur, contient des paroles autobiographiques rappelant les mésaventures de Spears.

SRC: She qualified in 1990 as a professor at the University of Hamburg and was promoted to a level C-3 professor in 1996. [[SEP]] Five years later, Beisiegel qualified as a level C-4 professor and became director of the Institute of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology at the University Medical Center Hamburg-Eppendorf.
REF: Cinq ans plus tard, Beisiegel a obtenu son diplôme de professeure de niveau C-4 et est devenue la directrice de l'Institut de biochimie et de biologie moléculaire au Centre médical universitaire d'Hambourg-Eppendorf.
WRONG-REF: Cinq ans plus tard, Beisiegel a obtenu son diplôme de professeur de niveau C-4 et est devenu le directeur de l'Institut de biochimie et de biologie moléculaire au Centre médical universitaire d'Hambourg-Eppendorf.

SRC: She completed her Ph.D. at the University of Kansas in 1927, writing a thesis on the role of hydrogen ion concentration in the precipitation of calcium and magnesium. [[SEP]] Weeks became an assistant professor and in 1937, an associate professor.
REF: Weeks est devenue professeure adjointe et en 1937, professeure associée.
WRONG-REF: Weeks est devenu professeur adjoint et en 1937, professeur associé.

SRC: In 2003, Baginski left her position at the NSA to become the executive assistant director of Intelligence at the FBI. [[SEP]] As the executive assistant director of Intelligence at the FBI between 2003-2005, Baginski successfully led the bureau's first-ever intelligence program.
REF: Lorsqu'elle était directrice générale adjointe des services de renseignements au FBI entre 2003 et 2005, Baginski a dirigé avec succès le tout premier programme de renseignements du Bureau.
WRONG-REF: Lorsqu'il était directeur général adjoint des services de renseignements au FBI entre 2003 et 2005, Baginski a dirigé avec succès le tout premier programme de renseignements du Bureau.

SRC: In the 1989 general election she defeated three other candidates to keep her seat. [[SEP]] As Minister Osterman rejected recommendations from an Assistant Deputy Minister Darwish regarding the insolvent state of Principal Group subsidiaries.
REF: Alors que la ministre Osterman rejetait les recommandations du sous-ministre adjoint Darwish concernant le statut d'insolvabilité des filiales du Principal Group.
WRONG-REF: Alors que le ministre Osterman rejetait les recommandations du sous-ministre adjoint Darwish concernant le statut d'insolvabilité des filiales du Principal Group.

SRC: Fraleigh was born in 1976 in Beaufort, SC, and raised in rural Hyde Park, New York where she attended Franklin Delano Roosevelt High School. [[SEP]] Fraleigh is an associate professor and the department chairperson of the Moravian College art department.
REF: Fraleigh est professeure associée et la présidente du département d'art de Moravian College.
WRONG-REF: Fraleigh est professeur associé et le président du département d'art de Moravian College.

SRC: She was mentored by Professor John Hunter, Professor of Medicine at Otago in the early stages of her career. REF: Cardiologue, Resieaux était cheffe du département de cardiologie de Dunedin Hospital et cardiologue consultante pour le ministère de la santé d'Otago et professeure associée à l'université d'Otago.
WRONG-REF: Cardiologue, Resieaux était chef du département de cardiologie de Dunedin Hospital et cardiologue consultant pour le ministère de la santé d'Otago et professeur associé à l'université d'Otago.
